-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | FTP client package with conduit interface based off http-conduit
--   
--   This package allows files on remote FTP servers to be available
--   through the Conduit interface.
@package ftp-conduit
@version 0.0.5


-- | This module contains code to use files on a remote FTP server as
--   Sources and Sinks.
--   
--   Using these functions looks like this:
--   
--   <pre>
--   let uri = fromJust $ parseURI "ftp://ftp.kernel.org/pub/README_ABOUT_BZ2_FILES"
--   runResourceT $ createSource uri $$ consume
--   </pre>
module Network.FTP.Conduit

-- | Create a conduit sink out of a <a>URI</a>. Uses the <tt>STOR</tt>
--   command.
createSink :: MonadResource m => URI -> Sink ByteString m ()

-- | Create a conduit source out of a <a>URI</a>. Uses the <tt>RETR</tt>
--   command.
createSource :: MonadResource m => URI -> Source m ByteString

-- | Thrown if a FTP-level protocol exception happens
data FTPException
UnexpectedCode :: Int -> ByteString -> FTPException
GeneralError :: String -> FTPException
IncorrectScheme :: String -> FTPException
SocketClosed :: FTPException
instance Typeable FTPException
instance Show FTPException
instance Exception FTPException
